DataSource.Name: Default
DataSource.SQL: select§§n T.TransactionFiscalDate,§§n LOC.AccountCode as LocationCode,§§n LOC.DisplayName as LocationName,§§n OPA.AccountCode as OpAreaCode,§§n OPA.DisplayName as OpAreaName,§§n W.WorkstationCode as WorkstationCode,§§n W.WorkstationName as WorkstationName,§§n U.DisplayName as UserName,§§n SU.DisplayName as SupervisorName,§§n Coalesce(PM.PluginName, Drv.DriverName) as PaymentMethodName,§§n Sum(P.PaymentAmount) as Amount§§nfrom§§n tbPayment P inner join§§n tbPlugin PM on PM.PluginId=P.PluginId inner join§§n tbDriver Drv on Drv.DriverId=PM.DriverId inner join§§n tbTransaction T on T.TransactionId=P.TransactionId left outer join§§n tbAccount U on U.AccountId=T.UserAccountId left outer join§§n tbAccount SU on SU.AccountId=T.SupAccountId left outer join§§n tbWorkstation W on W.WorkstationId=T.WorkstationId left outer join§§n tbAccount OPA on OPA.AccountId=T.OpAreaId left outer join§§n tbAccount LOC on LOC.AccountId=OPA.ParentAccountId§§nwhere§§n P.PaymentStatus=2 /* Approved */ and§§n T.TransactionFiscalDate>=:@DateFrom and§§n DateAdd(day, -1, T.TransactionFiscalDate)<:@DateTo and§§n (:@WorkstationId is null or W.WorkstationId=:@WorkstationId) and§§n (:@OpAreaId is null or OPA.AccountId=:@OpAreaId) and§§n (:@LocationId is null or LOC.AccountId=:@LocationId) and§§n (:@UserId is null or T.UserAccountId=:@UserId) and§§n (§§n :@Z_TagName is null or§§n :@Z_TagName='' or§§n T.TransactionId in (§§n select distinct XTrn.TransactionId§§n from§§n tbTransaction XTrn inner join§§n tbSaleItem XSI on XSI.SaleId=XTrn.SaleId inner join§§n tbTagLink XTGL on XTGL.EntityId=XSI.ProductId inner join§§n tbTag XTag on XTag.TagId=XTGL.TagId§§n where§§n XTrn.TransactionFiscalDate>=:@DateFrom and§§n DateAdd(day, -1, XTrn.TransactionFiscalDate)<:@DateTo and§§n XTag.EntityType=12 and --ProductType§§n XTag.TagName=:@Z_TagName§§n )§§n )§§ngroup by§§n T.TransactionFiscalDate,§§n LOC.AccountCode,§§n LOC.DisplayName,§§n OPA.AccountCode,§§n OPA.DisplayName,§§n W.WorkstationCode,§§n W.WorkstationName,§§n U.DisplayName,§§n SU.DisplayName,§§n PM.PluginName,§§n Drv.DriverName§§nhaving §§n Sum(P.PaymentAmount)<>0§§norder by§§n T.TransactionFiscalDate,§§n LOC.DisplayName,§§n OPA.DisplayName,§§n W.WorkstationName,§§n U.DisplayName,§§n SU.DisplayName,§§n PM.PluginName,§§n Drv.DriverName
